explains: adj. 高尚的；尊贵的；兴奋的
v. 高举；赞扬；使激动（exalt 的过去分词）

sentences.en: I felt exalted and newly alive.
sentences.cn: 我感到兴高采烈，充满新的活力。

sentences.en: You're moving in very exalted circles!
sentences.cn: 你这是出入于显贵要人的圈子呀！

sentences.en: She was the only woman to rise to such an exalted position.
sentences.cn: 她是唯一高升到如此显赫地位的女人。
